    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        public Command()
        Default Constructor.

      • Command

        public Command(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String user,
               java.lang.String version,
               CommandStatus status,
               java.lang.String executable)
        Construct a new Command with all required parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the command. Not null/empty/blank.
        user - The user who created the command. Not null/empty/blank.
        version - The version of this command. Not null/empty/blank.
        status - The status of the command. Not null.
        executable - The executable of the command. Not null/empty/blank.
